name: NSComparisonPredicate.Modifier
desc: Constants that describe the possible types of modifier for a comparison predicate.

items.name: case direct
items.desc: A predicate to compare directly the left and right hand sides.

items.name: case all
items.desc: A predicate to compare all entries in the destination of a to-many relationship.

items.name: case any
items.desc: A predicate to match with any entry in the destination of a to-many relationship.
